import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import Navbar from '../AdminComponents/Navbar' import AddProductModal from '../AdminComponents/AddProductModal' import AddCategoryModal from '../AdminComponents/AddCategoryModal' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import productContext from '../context/product/productContext' const AdminDashboard = () => { // for product context const pContext = useContext(productContext) const { getProducts, products } = pContext const limit = 5 const skip = 0 // const [skip, setSkip] = useState(0) // const [keyWord, setKeyWord] = useState('') // const [category, setCategory] = useState('') // const [totalResults, setTotalResults] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { getProducts(limit, skip, '', '') // eslint-disable-next-line }, []) return (
